version_description:
With PhotoSync, the photos you take with your iPhone will be automatically backed up to MEGA.
You can use WiFi or cellular connection and by enabling Background mode the app will upload photos when your location changes significantly.

Passcode lock adds a new layer of security by requiring a four-digit passcode to be entered every time the app is launched. This will protect your files even if your iPhone falls into the wrong hands. There’s also an option to erase all data and logout if the wrong password is entered over 10 times.

Various bug fixes and speed improvements.

Your feedback is very important to us and, although we might not answer every email, we read each and every one.
Also, your 5-stars rating in the AppStore is always appreciated.

Version 2.0 
• Camera Uploads now allows you to upload videos and sync multiple photo albums
• When you select to remain logged in, the session is restored in seconds for faster access.
• Preview images with one tap. Download documents and keep them offline for easier access even when not connected.
• Secure the app with TouchID - your fingerprint is your key
• Various bug fixes and improvements

We're always listening to feedback, so please send any comments and suggestions to ios@mega.co.nz

Thank you for using our app! If you like this release please leave a review!

- App no longer freezes at start.
- IPv6 support.
- Files in the Offline section can be opened on other apps.
- Photos and videos can be saved in the Photos app from the Offline section.
- Compatibility with more kinds of files.
- “Choose” button fixed on iPad.
- Some bug fixes.
- Added translations to Bosnian, German, Ewe, Persian, French, Hebrew, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Romanian, Slovak, Turkish and Vietnamese.

We have considered your requests and we're working on them to bring the improvements to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your feedback and for using this service!

- Solved login issues and problems at app's start.

- Now you can play audio in background.

- Fixed problems with uploading files.
- Lots of fixes for iOS 7. We haven't forgotten you!
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.
- Localization updated.

- Thumbnails for videos. From now on, new videos uploaded to MEGA will have a thumbnail. In order to create thumbnails for videos already uploaded, you should stream the video or download it (Set up thumbnails don't work for videos uploaded by others users)
- Loading view. Shows progress and notifies if the "Servers are too busy".
- UI improvements on the Cloud Drive: If a file or folder has a public link, a little chain image will appear next to them. Grid view for photos. Restyling of the cells for some states.
- Streaming improved.
- Fixed over-quota alert bug.
- Passcode protection: Now Touch ID can be optional. A blur view will appear when the app goes to the background. We have fixed the issues occurring whenever you killed the app, with complex passcode…
- Miscellaneous bug fixes (Shared Items, actions on iOS 7, allow playing music on background from another app, ...)
- Localization updated.

- Camera Uploads. Major stability improvements.
- File and folder links management improved as well as its design. Now you can import/download folder links or some of its contents. You can also open “Links without key” on the app (You have to enter the decryption key to see its contents.)
- Share folders by inserting an email. If the addressees don't have a MEGA account, they will receive an invitation to create it. If they already have it, they should accept the contact request and the shared folder will appear on their "Shared" tab.
- Offline. You can share, save images and videos to Photos (5 tops), copy, print, delete, etc. multiple files.
- Advanced. New section in Settings. There you can clear your Offline files, clear cache and empty the Rubbish Bin.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.
- Localization updated. Added localization to Arabic, Bulgarian, Filipino, Slovenian, Serbian, Thai and Ukrainian.

- Copy or share multiple files or folders from the Cloud Drive, Camera Uploads and Shared Items - Outgoing.
- Photo viewer: Save original picture instead of the preview. Allow photos to be moved to the Rubbish Bin.
- Save photos and videos directly in Photos. By default they are saved in the Offline section. If you want to enable this feature go to Settings - Advanced.
- Add sorting options for Offline files.
- Improvements when you add contacts: Add multiple contacts; if one of the contacts has more than one email, select one of them. Also fixed issue when you add a linked contact (iOS 9+).
- Show all photos in the picker view (The photos stored in iCloud did not appear).
- Fixed some problems with Camera Uploads.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.
- Localization updated.

- Change your email in Settings -> Security Options -> Change email.
- Improved process for saving your Recovery Key.
- Reset your password, if you have a backup of your Recovery Key, in Settings -> Security Options -> Forgot password?
- If you don't have a backup of your Recovery Key, and you don't have any active MEGA session in any other device, you can park your existing account and start an empty new one under the same email address on the Login view -> Forgot password? -> No -> Park account. Your data will be retained for 60 days. If you recall your parked account's password, please contact support@mega.nz 
- Close other sessions in Settings -> Security Options -> Close other sessions.
- Close your account in Settings -> Advanced -> Close account.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes.

- Chat: MEGA protects your chat with end-to-end (user controlled) encryption providing essential safety assurances.
  - Include files from your Cloud Drive directly in a chat. You can import chat files to your Cloud Drive or Save for Offline (Long press on a message to see the options).
  - In a group chat the participants can have different roles (Moderator, standard and read-only).
  - Edit or delete message for one hour after sending.

- Moved Rubbish Bin from Settings to Cloud Drive (Cloud Drive -> ... button -> Rubbish Bin).

- Contacts:
  - Detail view: For contact details and 1on1 chat details. Now, it shows the incoming shared folders with that contact.
  - Revamp of the Contact Request view.

- My Account UI tweaks. Change name and remove avatar (My Account -> Edit).
- New styles for the whole app.
- Miscellaneous bug fixes and performance improvements

- Document and file providers. You can see and edit in others apps files from MEGA. Also, export files to other apps from MEGA. 
"See and edit mode" example. Steps to edit a file using Pages: open Pages, select Locations, choose MEGA, select a file, edit it, and when you close the document (tapping Done and Back <) it will be uploaded automatically to MEGA (You will see both files in MEGA, the original and the edited with the same name)
"Import mode" example. Steps to import a file using Google Drive: open Google Drive, select +, tap in upload, choose MEGA, select a file (the file will be downloaded and uploaded to Google Drive).

- Fixed some connectivity issues.
- Fixed some issues in iOS 8 and iOS 11.
- Now the app warns you if you have data Saved for Offline before logout.
- Allow to change file's extension.
- Improvements on battery consumption.
- Other miscellaneous fixes and performance improvements.

- We added another gesture: if you long press, you will enter selection mode (in the Cloud Drive, Camera Uploads, Shared and Offline sections).
- Search improvements: added a search box in Browser, Contacts, Shared and Offline (the search here works only on the current folder). Easily find the destination folder when moving, copying or importing a file or folder.
- Sharing improvements. Remove a link or a sharing from details view ('i' icon). Also from here, you can see the contacts with whom you shared a folder.
- Improved support for iOS 11 Smart Invert, keeping the multimedia items with their original color.
- Fixed an issue with the unread chats badge; chats with the history truncated were counted as unread during initialization.
- Other miscellaneous bug fixes and performance improvements.

We want to solve your problems! If you reported an issue in an App Store review, please send a detailed e-mail to support@mega.nz so that we can fix it in the next version. Thank you for using MEGA!

- New design. We have improved the app with some new views to enhance your interaction, also we have redesigned some others. We added some gestures: Swipe to left to share and swipe to right to download.
- Show versions of files. Allow to download, revert or delete a version. You can find versions by tapping on cell dots ··· -> File info -> Scroll to bottom -> Versions.
- New photo browser: Access to the Cloud Drive options directly from the photo browser. Download the original photo when zooming. Swipe up/down to dismiss the photo.
- Invite a contact scanning the QR code. Enable 'Auto-Accept' option and contacts that scan your QR Code will be automatically added to your contact list. Share your QR code (You can also reset it).
- Send to contact. We have added a functionality to send files directly from your Cloud Drive to your contacts using the chat. All end-to-end encrypted. Select some files, tap on share, 'Send to contact' -> Select contacts or group chats and tap 'Send'.
- In the Chat, we added a button to go to the latest or new messages.
- Preview multimedia files (photos and videos) when opening from file links.
- Improvements previewing pdfs (only for iOS 11):
    + Allow search text and open page where located
    + Thumbnails view to select and open page
    + Save the page you were when closing a pdf, the next time you open it, it will be opened in the page you closed it.
- Improvements to help you to remember your password with "Password reminder". The app will ask for the password in some cases. If you don't remember the password, the app will help you to export the recovery key to avoid losing your account and files.
- Allow pause transfers individually.
- Fixed issue with passcode and PiP mode.
- Don't require the passcode when accepting an incoming call (after the call finishes the app will require it).
- Other miscellaneous bugs fixes and improvements.

We want to solve your problems! If you reported an issue in an App Store review, please send a detailed e-mail to support@mega.nz so that we can fix it in the next version. Thank you for using MEGA!

- Enhance the chat experience with Rich links previews. When you write a URL in a message we will ask you if you want to enable this option so that you and your contacts can see Rich links previews. You can enable or disable it in Settings -> Chat -> Rich URL previews.
- Universal links. MEGA URL will redirect directly to the app without opening Safari first.
- The history of audio video calls will be shown on each chat.
- Added advanced setting "Save media in gallery". Disable it if you don't want to save images taken and video recorded from within the app in the Camera Roll.
- Some users complaint because they can't preview zip documents, we fixed it.
- You won't see the player black screen when you try to play unsupported multimedia files. We will warn you in case that you try to play some file that is not supported.
- Added support for contact links.
- Other miscellaneous bugs fixes and improvements.

- The history of audio video calls will be shown on each chat.
- Added advanced setting "Save media in gallery". Disable it if you don't want to save images taken and video recorded from within the app in the Camera Roll.
- Some users complaint because they can't preview zip documents, we fixed it.
- You won't see the player black screen when you try to play unsupported multimedia files. We will warn you in case that you try to play some file that is not supported.
- Added support for contact links.
- Other miscellaneous bugs fixes and improvements.

If you want to be the first one to receive the updates of the app write to iosfeedback@mega.nz giving us your email and we will add you to MEGA's TestFlight.

We want to solve your problems! If you reported an issue in an App Store review, please send a detailed e-mail to support@mega.nz so that we can fix it in the next version. Thank you for using MEGA!

- New ways to share files with your contacts. Now, you can share files and text snippets from other apps directly to a contact or group. Optionally, you can rename files before being shared. Also, you can forward chat messages and share their contents to other apps.
- Share videos easily through the Chat. We process the videos to the most compatible format. You can select the quality of the videos you share in Settings -> Chat > Video quality (Medium is the default one)
- Archive chats. Now you can archive chats manually through the swipe to left gesture or on the chat room details. You can access to the archive section on the Chat tab when being at the top of the chats list, pulling down twice, one to see the search bar and one to see the "Archive chats" section.
- Restore file/folders from Rubbish Bin. Go to the Rubbish Bin, tap on three dots in the file/folder that you want to Restore and then select the restore. Furthermore, you can restore multiple files/folders in a bulk
- Improve the experience when searching files, folders or contacts.
- Other miscellaneous bugs fixes and improvements.

- Email Verification. If unusual login activity is detected, your account may be temporarily suspended for your safety until you complete an account verification using your registered email. It is possible that if you are using the same password for your MEGA account as for other services, and that at least one of these other services has suffered a data breach, your password may be used by bad actors to log into your other accounts, including, but not limited to, your MEGA account.
- SMS Verification. This feature allows you to link your mobile number to your account, this will then allow other MEGA users to discover you by your mobile number. This functionality will be enabled gradually across different markets.
- MEGA chat invitation. You will be able to discover who in your device contacts is using MEGA and invite them to be a MEGA contact. You will have to add your mobile number to your MEGA account to be able to do this.
- The chat toolbar can be expanded.
- Other miscellaneous bugs fixes and improvements.

It is possible that if you are using the same password for your MEGA account as for other services, and that at least one of these other services has suffered a data breach, your password may be used by bad actors to log into your other accounts, including, but not limited to, your MEGA account.
- SMS Verification. This feature allows you to link your mobile number to your account, this will then allow other MEGA users to discover you by your mobile number. This functionality will be enabled gradually across different markets.
- MEGA chat invitation. You will be able to discover who in your device contacts is using MEGA and invite them to be a MEGA contact. You will have to add your mobile number to your MEGA account to be able to do this.
- The chat toolbar can be expanded.
- Other miscellaneous bugs fixes and improvements.

If you want to be the first one to receive the updates follow this link: https://testflight.apple.com/join/4x1P5Tnx

- New design with Dark Mode.

- Contacts has been redesigned: if you tap on a contact, the chat with that contact will be opened. If you tap on the info button the contact details will be shown. New contacts will appear on the new section 'Recently Added'. Inside Contacts we have a new Groups section on which you can see all the group chats you have.

- My Account has been redesigned: you now have quick access to show or scan your MEGA QR code.

- Settings - Appearance: now you can change the Sorting and View Mode preferences for the app. The Sorting preference can be per folder (It is the default) or you can choose the same sorting preference for the whole app. Same for the View mode preference: you can choose between list or thumbnail per folder (as always) or for the whole app. You can also change the default icon of the app.

- My Account - Usage: it shows how much storage or transfer quota you have used.

- Image picker redesigned: You can find it tapping on ... at top -> Upload -> Choose or open a chat and tap on the picture icon in the input toolbar.

- Mute chat notifications for 30 minutes, 1 hour, 6 hours, 24 hours or until you decide to turn it on again. Mute one on one or group chats individually by opening the chat, then tap on top to access the details of the chat -> chat notifications, or mute all chats in My Account -> Settings -> Chat -> Do Not Disturb.

- Others miscellaneous bugs fixes and improvements.

If you want to be the first one to receive the updates follow this link: https://testflight.apple.com/join/4x1P5Tnx
